segments.text: What's your favorite dish or dishes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I always order fried spring rolls when I go to Chinatown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But a Chinese person would never order that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alex , you don't know what to order . Let's go to a Chinese restaurant together next time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Get ready for the best meal of your life !
segments.speaker: S2
